IRS990.MissionDesc: THE LINCOLN BENEFIT TRUST WAS ESTABLISHED WITH THE LINCOLN INTERMEDIATE AND SCHOOL DISTRICTS IN THE ADAMS, FRANKLIN, LANCASTER AND YORK COUNTIES OF PENNSYLVANIA TO COLLABORATE TO OFFER EMPLOYEE HEALTH BENEFITS COVERAGE FOR MEDICAL, PRESCRIPTION, DENTAL, VISION AND CERTAIN OTHER BENEFITS FOR ITS MEMBERS.
IRS990.Desc: EMPLOYEE BENEFITS PAID TO THE EMPLOYEES OF PARTICIPATING MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES GENERALLY ACCEPTED IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA REQUIRE MANAGEMENT TO EVALUATE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE TRUST AND RECOGNIZE A TAX LIABILITY (OR ASSET) IS THE TRUST HAS TAKEN AN UNCERTAIN POSITION THAT MORE LIKELY THAN NOT WOULD NOT BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY FEDERAL, STATE, OR LOCAL TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE TRUST IS SUBJECT TO ROUTINE AUDITS BY TAXING JURISDICTIONS; HOWEVER, THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO AUDITS FOR ANY TAX PERIODS IN PROGRESS.

THE LINCOLN BENEFIT TRUST WAS ESTABLISHED WITH THE LINCOLN INTERMEDIATE AND SCHOOL DISTRICTS IN THE ADAMS, FRANKLIN, LANCASTER AND YORK COUNTIES OF PENNSYLVANIA TO COLLABORATE TO OFFER EMPLOYEE HEALTH BENEFITS COVERAGE FOR MEDICAL, PRESCRIPTION, DENTAL, VISION AND CERTAIN OTHER BENEFITS FOR ITS MEMBERS.
THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED IN DETAIL BY THE LBT MANAGEMENT BEFORE SUBMISSION.
A STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL INTERESTS IS FILED BY EACH TRUSTEE, ANNUALLY.

THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST BY CONTACTING PATRICIA MCVICKER, TRUST MANAGER, AT (717) 624-6493 OR AT THE ORGANIZATION'S MAILING ADDRESS AT P.O. BOX 70, NEW OXFORD, PA 17350.

THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCE COMMITTEE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND MAKES RECOMMENDATIONS FOR THE SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT WHICH IS APPROVED BY THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THIS PROCESS IS THE SAME AS LAST YEAR.
